Arguments.Name: --live-reload
Arguments.Description: Enable the live reloading in the development server (this is the default)

Arguments.Name: --no-reload
Arguments.Description: Disable the live reloading in the development server

Arguments.Name: --dirtyreload
Arguments.Description: Enable the live reloading in the development server, but only re-build files that have changed

Arguments.Name: --watch-theme
Arguments.Description: Include the theme in list of files to watch for live reloading. Ignored when live reload is not used

Arguments.Name: -w
Arguments.Description: A directory or file to watch for live reloading. Can be supplied multiple times
